resources.string: The strings.xml file is located in the res/values folder and it contains all the text that your application uses.

In Android, a drawable folder is compiled visual resource that can not use backgrounds, banners, icons, splash screen etc.

The Google Android SDK is a toolset which is used by developers to write apps on Android enabled devices. It contains a graphical interface that emulates an Android driven handheld environment and allow them to test and debug their codes.
Android does not support other language than java
